content: I'm trying to get multiple examples to show up on an operation definition, but as far as I can tell, there are only slots for one example (with a Request and a Response portion of the example). Anyone know if there's a way to get multiple examples to show up?
I'll have to look - make a task
It seems to be sort of possible, based on this page: https://hl7-fhir.github.io/codesystem-operations.html
But I couldn't get that approach to work (and it lists all the requests, then all the responses, sort of confusing).
